verses.roman:
kṛpā kari' ei tattva kaha ta' āmāre
tomā-vinā keha ihā nirūpite nāre

synonyms: kṛpā kari'-showing your mercy; ei tattva—all these truths; kaha—explain; ta'-certainly; āmāre—unto Me; tomā-vinā—except for you; keha—someone; ihā—this; nirūpite—to explain; nāre—not able.
translation: "Kindly explain all these truths to Me. But for yourself, no one can do so."
